short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension integrates directly with the Wordle game to show the remaining possibilities based on the board hints.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wordle Genie integrates directly with the game in the browser to show real-time updates on the remaining possibilities. Add an additional dimension of fun to your Wordle experience and learn a few new words along the way!

Note: This extension is not affiliated with nor endorsed by the NY Times organization. This extension is the product of a private individual just trying to have a bit more fun with the game.

To use the extension, it will automatically update the board once you start or continue a Wordle game at https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/.
